name: DomesticDutiesOrHouseholdTasksADLIADL
title: Domestic Duties or Household Tasks (ADL/IADL)
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of domestic duties/household tasks (ADL/IADL) ability.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's ability to perform demostic duties/household tasks as an ADL/IADL.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Domestic Duties or Household Tasks (ADL/IADL).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Domestic Duties or Household Tasks (ADL/IADL).)

contains.display: Prepare light meals - functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Prior functioning.household tasks during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Degree of difficulty experienced due to your hip while going shopping in the last week [HOOS]
Degree of difficulty experienced due to your hip while doing light domestic duties (cooking, dusting, etc) in the last week [HOOS]
Degree of difficulty experienced due to your hip while doing heavy domestic duties (moving heavy boxes, scrubbing floors, etc) in the last week [HOOS]
Degree of difficulty experienced due to your knee while going shopping in the last week [KOOS]
Degree of difficulty experienced due to your knee while doing light domestic duties (cooking, dusting, etc) in the last week [KOOS]
Degree of difficulty experienced due to your knee while doing heavy domestic duties (moving heavy boxes, scrubbing floors, etc) in the last week [KOOS]
Makes a light cold meal - most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Makes a light hot meal - most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Light daily housework - most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Heavier periodic housework - most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Light shopping- most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Makes a light cold meal - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Makes a light hot meal - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Light daily housework - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Heavier periodic housework - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Light shopping - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
